entry.div:
Molding a single
vine
leaf
Plant it with the
points of fine
iron
latten wire
& place diagonally on the
clay
slab
, then cast the first
mold
. When it has set, uncover the
back
reverse & make the second cast, which once set, you can take away the leaf. And you will need to reheat your
mold
only once, because there will be nothing to burn.
